TitleEnglish: Final Fantasy IX: The Black Mages Legacy
SummaryEnglish: Mel, Koln, Luciola, Thea, Fala, and Doc are the last descendants of the great hero Vivi, who once fought alongside Zidane and Queen Garnet. Living peacefully in Alexandria, their lives are disrupted when Koln finds Mel paralyzed. To save him, the brothers must leave Alexandria and embark on a journey to find a cure, stepping out of their familiar home to explore the vast world beyond.
